verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Immortal, invisible, God only wise, newline In light inaccessible newline Hid from our eyes; newline Most blessed, most glorious, newline The Ancient of Days; newline Almighty, victorious, newline Thy great name we praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Unresting, unhasting newline And silent as light; newline Nor wanting, nor wasting, newline Thou rulest in might. newline Thy justice, like mountains, newline High soaring above; newline Thy clouds, which are fountains newline Of goodness and love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To all, life Thou givest, newline To both great and small; newline In all, life Thou livest, newline The true life of all; newline We blossom and flourish newline As leaves on the tree, newline And wither and perish newline But naught changeth Thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Great Father of glory, newline Pure Father of light; newline Thine angels adore Thee newline All veiling their sight. newline All praise we would render, newline O help us to see newline 'Tis only the splendor newline Of light hideth Thee. newline Amen.
